text:
Hi - we’ve got Fivetran set up to pull HubSpot data into our data warehouse. It’s been having problems for 1 week where syncs take hours and hours. I feel we’re being throttled on our API usage, even though I know we’re sending few API requests. We get these errors in Fivetran’s logs:

```"Some Error occurred, Retrying after 60 seconds. Error : HTTP 500 Internal Server Error"
"Retrying after 60 seconds, Reason : Bad Gateway"```
Where can we get some insight into this issue and whether our API usage is being throttled or blocked?
Can anyone tell me if this is data of total opens / unique opens is available in the API? This is under the Marketing - Performance tab

*Webhooks API question:* any one know where I can find a list of possible `changeSource` values?

the docs state that the `changeSource` can:
> "...be any of they change sources that you find on contact property histories."
I imagine there's a list of possible "contact property histories" but haven't been able to find anything about that in the v3 docs (I just started to dig in the legacy docs now to see if there's anything there).
Anyone know where I can find this, or has a list of known `changeSource`'s you've seen from Webhook requests?

Hi there - running into an issue with contact batch create API resource, starting from last week Tuesday March 9 around 12 noon CT onward through now.

POST /contacts/v1/contact/batch/

When accessing the batch create resource via my application, HubSpot is returning a *Response 405* error with no other details every time.

My application accesses the resource multiple times daily, I have not changed any code in over a month and apikey has not expired or changed. Did not catch the error til now, but after checking the logs determined the error started around Tuesday March 9 around 12 noon CT.

Is anyone having this issue?
==
*EDIT: Found earlier in thread that "http:" needed to be changed to "https:" in requests*

Hello there. Hopefully I am asking this in the right channel. I am aware of the single contact subscription status API call, but I was wondering if there is a way to query for multiple contacts subscription statuses at once.
Even better if it would be possible to only get changes since a certain date. Thank you so much! (edited)

Hi everyone, this is Ashutosh.
I have a couple of queries regarding the Bulk import APIs/Batch APIs .
1. In import API ,in case of any import errors ,we only get count of objects that failed to import.
Example:
`"counters": {`
            `"TOTAL_ROWS": 6,`
            `"PROPERTY_VALUES_EMITTED": 5,`
            `"CREATED_OBJECTS": 1,`
            `"UPDATED_OBJECTS": 4,`
            `"ERRORS": 1,`
            `"UNIQUE_OBJECTS_WRITTEN": 5`
        `}`
I am aware that we can download import error file from the application,Is there any way we can fetch failed records programmatically ?

2.We can read a batch of Objects(contact,companies,deals etc.) by internal ID, or unique property values. Could anyone please provide any resources /examples as to which unique keys can be used in the respective endpoints of objects.

Would really appreciate any inputs..Thanks!
Hi all - our scripts uploading to /filemanager/api/v3/files/upload have suddenly started failing with Reason: Method Not Allowed.  Any thoughts?
Someone else saw something like this. Are you using TLS from the get-go in your request URLS, i.e. all urls are `https://` not `http://` ?

Hi Guys, I noticed calls to /contacts/v1/contact/vid/:vid/profile stopped returning the "profile-url" today. Can that get turned back on? We use it send people back to the right profile page in the HubSpot crm
hello every one , I want to create contact with hs_legal_basis property however the api of create or update contact does not support that property .
=> Legitimate interest ? existing customer was not one of the allowed options
any idea how can i add it to my contact with api ?
I'm seeing the same behavior as <@UNDQNU056> in the `/contacts/v1/contact/vid/:vid/profile` route not returning the `profile-url` key, and only the `vid` key
